> This paper describes how we used novelty search to discover a set of
>=
 properties that describe the behavior of software models, where some
> pro=
perties likely represent bugs.

This is good. But still a lot of work is du=
e in this area. I hope some day I will see a paper about automatic programm=
ing from natural language, or if not from natural language, at least from s=
ome generic specification language.
